trans-unit.source: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.
<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework <xref:System.Decimal> data type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> その対応する .NET Framework から別の基になるデータ構造を持つ<xref:System.Decimal>データ型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Decimal> has no concept of precision.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Decimal> 有効桁数の概念はありません。

trans-unit.source: It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28.
trans-unit.target: 3 バイトを使用して、実際のデータを格納し、ために、最大小数点以下桁数は 28 です。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> has both precision and scale.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> precision と scale の両方がします。

trans-unit.source: It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38.
trans-unit.target: 4 バイトの符号なし整数は 4 を使用して、実際のデータを格納して、ために、最大有効桁数と小数点以下桁数 38 です。

trans-unit.source: The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value to be stored as a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> value.
A double, representing the value for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied double parameter.
The supplied integer value which will the used as the value of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied integer value.
The supplied long integer value which will the used as the value of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied long integer value.
The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The number of decimal places to which the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property will be resolved for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure represents a positive or negative number.
The 128-bit unsigned integer that provides the value of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied parameters.
The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property of the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The number of decimal places to which the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property will be resolved for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure represents a positive or negative number.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data2, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures value.

An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data3 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure using the supplied parameters.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The Abs method gets the absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameter.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property contains the unsigned number representing the absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameter.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Calculates the sum of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operators.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property contains the sum.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to be adjusted.
The number of digits in the adjusted structure.
If this parameter is <see langword="true" />, the new Value will be rounded, if <see langword="false" />, the value will be truncated.
The scale of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operand will be adjusted to the number of digits indicated by the digits parameter.
Depending on the value of the fRound parameter, the value will either be rounded to the appropriate number of digits or truncated.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property contains the adjusted number.
Get the binary representation of the value of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure as an array of bytes.
An array of bytes that contains the binary representation of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's value.
trans-unit.target: バイナリ表現を含むバイト配列、<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />構造体の値。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure for which the ceiling value is to be calculated.
Returns the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> representing the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Compares this instance to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> to be compared.
Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> instance to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Return value
</term><description> Condition
</description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
</term><description> This instance is less than the object.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This instance is the same as the object.
</description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
</term><description> This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> instance to the supplied <see cref="T:System.Object" /> and returns an indication of their relative values.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
<list type="table"><listheader><term> Return Value
</term><description> Condition
</description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
</term><description> This instance is less than the object.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This instance is the same as the object.
</description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
</term><description> This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose value is to be adjusted.
The precision for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The scale for the new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Adjusts the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operand to the indicated precision and scale.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose Value has been adjusted to the precision and scale indicated in the parameters.
Gets the binary representation of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure as an array of integers.
An array of integers that contains the binary representation of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: これのバイナリ表現を含む整数の配列<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />構造体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The division operator calculates the results of dividing the first <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operand by the second.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property contains the results of the division.
Returns a value that indicates whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> and the supplied object parameter represent the same value.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
Compares the supplied <see cref="T:System.Object" /> parameter to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> instance.
<see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> and the two are equal.
Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operands to determine whether they are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if the two values are equal.
Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
If either instance is null, the value of the <see langword="SqlDecimal" /> will be null.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure for which the floor value is to be calculated.
Rounds a specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> number to the next lower whole number.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure that contains the whole number part of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
A <see langword="string" /> value that indicates the XSD of the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameters to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure is null.
<see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> この場合<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />構造が null です。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: それ以外の場合は <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md).
trans-unit.target: 詳細については、次を参照してください。 [Null 値の処理](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/handling-null-values.md)です。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure is greater than zero.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> is assigned to null.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 場合、<see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" />は null に割り当てられます。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: それ以外の場合は <see langword="false" />。

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
A constant representing the largest possible value for the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Precision" /> property.
The value of this constant is 38.
trans-unit.target: この定数の値は、38 です。

trans-unit.source: A constant representing the maximum value for the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Scale" /> property.
A constant representing the maximum value of a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A constant representing the minimum value for a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameters to determine whether they are not equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
Represents a <see cref="T:System.DBNull" /> that can be assigned to this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> class.

A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> is equal to the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.ByteValue" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> parameter.

The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble" /> structure to be converted.
Converts the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.GreaterThan(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.GreaterThan(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameters to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.

The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.GreaterThanOrEqual%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は、します。 <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte.ToSqlDecimal?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameters to determine whether they are not equal.

A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.NotEquals(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.NotEquals(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

Performs a logical comparison of two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structures to determine whether the first is less than the second.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.True" /> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
Otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.False" />.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" /> will be <see cref="F:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
The multiplication operator computes the product of the two <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameters.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property contains the product of the multiplication.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Multiply%28System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%2CSystem.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Calculates the results of subtracting the second <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operand from the first.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose Value property contains the results of the subtraction.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Subtract(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: この演算子を同等の方法は<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Subtract(System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal,System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal)?displayProperty=nameWithType>します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to be negated.
The unary minus operator negates the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> parameter.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose value contains the results of the negation.
The <see langword="String" /> to be parsed.
Converts the <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a number to its <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> equivalent.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> equivalent to the value that is contained in the specified <see cref="T:System.String" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to be raised to a power.
A double value that indicates the power to which the number should be raised.
Raises the value of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to the specified exponential power.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure that contains the results.
Gets the maximum number of digits used to represent the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property.
The maximum number of digits used to represent the <see langword="Value" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表すために使用する最大桁数、<see langword="Value" />この<see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />構造体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to be rounded.
The number of significant fractional digits (precision) in the return value.
Gets the number nearest the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's value with the specified precision.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure that contains the results of the rounding operation.
Gets the number of decimal places to which <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> is resolved.
The number of decimal places to which the <see langword="Value" /> property is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 小数点以下桁数、<see langword="Value" />プロパティを解決します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose sign is to be evaluated.
Gets a value that indicates the sign of a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property.
A number that indicates the sign of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
Calculates the results of subtracting the second <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> operand from the first.
A new <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure whose Value property contains the results of the subtraction.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An <see langword="XmlSchema" />.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Returns the a double equal to the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property of this instance.
The decimal representation of the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> is non-zero; <see langword="false" /> if zero; otherwise Null.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte" /> structure whose <see langword="Value" /> equals the <see langword="Value" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
If the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's Value is <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte" /> structure's <see langword="Value" /> will be 1.
Otherwise, the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte" /> structure's <see langword="Value" /> will be 0.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle" /> structure with the same value as this instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" />.

Converts this <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to <see cref="T:System.String" />.

A new <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that contains the string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's <see cref="P:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value" /> property.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure to be truncated.
The decimal position to which the number will be truncated.
Truncates the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure's value to the that you want position.
Supply a negative value for the <paramref name="position" /> parameter in order to truncate the value to the corresponding position to the left of the decimal point.
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal" /> structure.
This property is read-only.
